Hello Eben,

What you describe isn't RESTful and more generally isn't in li=
ne with the way the Web works. In particular you should keep in mind that U=
RIs identify things, not actions. You might want to read a good tutorial or=
 book on REST. You'll see that what you describe can be achieved using the =
HTTP methods (GET, PUT, ...).

Philippe Mougin
